update.smarter: Usiądź wygodnie, kiedy my ulepszamy Blitz.

share.page: Share this exact page via a browser accessible link.
share.match: Share this match via a browser accessible link.

mvp.future: …and a ton of new perks exclusive for MVP members in the future!

settings.when: When Draft or Live is ready.

import.toggle: Toggle to clear all existing builds.

settings.hiddenRanks: Player ranks and playstyles are hidden so you can focus on yourself.
settings.hide: Hide all player ranks and info in live.

badges.postmatch: Show all badges (including the bad ones) in post-match by default.

settings.detect: If we could not auto detect your installation folder, this can be set manually.

works.chrome: You never have to start up Chrome before a game again.

made.tilt: Made with Lots of Love and Tilt in California.

tooltips.one: Crafted by Blitz analysts with input from Challenger and pro players.
tooltips.two: New tier list comes out 1 day after new patch. Will continue to update throughout the patch.

error.emailRegistered: Email is already registered. Login via 'I already have an account.'
error.summonerDoesntExist: Summoner does not exist in this region. Try again.
error.summonerNotFound: We're unable to find the summoner name in the region specified. Make sure you're not entering your login username, and check the region. Enter the same name you use to look yourself up on op.gg or similar sites.
error.missingSpellData: '?' indicates that the data isn't available via the Riot Games API. Check the LoL client for the latest values.
error.notWorking: Not working? Join our Discord for help.
error.checkSpelling: Please double check region and spelling.

betaTester.thanks: Thanks for being part of an exclusive group helping us improve the app.
betaTester.howUsed: So how do you use the Blitz app?

one.part2: We'll auto-detect your champion, recommend runes and builds, and scout your teammates and opponents. No typing required.

steps.two: Track your performance when you aren't in game. We provide match history and champion stats with recommended builds from top players.

garenaSupport: Garena support is in <1>beta testing</1> from Blitz and the Riot Games API. As such, certain features like <3>live game</3> and <5>enemy scouting</5> are not available.
phRestriction: Blitz can't run in PH due to IP restrictions.

restartBar.readyToInstall: Update Ready to Install. Restarting in {{seconds}} seconds…
restartBar.restartToApply: We will restart in {{seconds}} seconds to apply the updates.
